pageContext.claim: “Every year, 50,000 illegal children are smuggled by coyotes and criminals into our country.”
pageContext.analysis: Customs and Border Protection reported that about 50,00 unaccompanied children were apprehended at the border in fiscal year 2018. But it's a stretch to say all of them were "smuggled by coyotes and criminals." Many arrived as part of caravans, which has only a relatively small percentage of criminals.
